displayProperties.name: Shotgun Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Shotguns get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that Shotgun.

displayProperties.name: Rocket Launcher Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Rocket Launchers get bonus reserves when picking up Heavy ammo.

displayProperties.name: Scout Rifle Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Scout Rifles over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

displayProperties.name: Submachine Gun Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Submachine Guns over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

displayProperties.name: Grenade Kickstart
displayProperties.description: When your grenade energy is fully expended, you gain grenade energy.

displayProperties.name: Distribution
displayProperties.description: Reduces all ability cooldowns when using your class ability near targets.

displayProperties.name: Encore
displayProperties.description: Precision final blows grant a stacking range bonus to this weapon. Non-precision final blows remove range stacks but grant bonus accuracy and stability when all range stacks have been removed.

displayProperties.name: Hand Cannon Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases your chances of finding Special ammo while you have a Hand Cannon that uses Special ammo equipped.

displayProperties.name: Overcharge Wellmaker
displayProperties.description: Defeating a combatant with a finisher spawns 2 Arc elemental wells.

displayProperties.name: Stasis Resistance
displayProperties.description: Reduces incoming Stasis damage from combatants.

displayProperties.name: Power Preservation
displayProperties.description: Your Super final blows create extra Orbs of Power for your allies.

displayProperties.name: Parting Gift
displayProperties.description: Dodging leaves behind an explosive that detonates after a short delay, damaging targets around it.

displayProperties.name: Orbs of Restoration
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants a small amount of energy to your ability with the least energy.

displayProperties.name: Hand Cannon Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Hand Cannons over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

displayProperties.name: Grave Robber
displayProperties.description: Melee final blows reload this weapon's magazine from reserves.

displayProperties.name: Drop Mag
displayProperties.description: Increases reload speed but reduces magazine size.

displayProperties.name: Harmony
displayProperties.description: Final blows with other weapons improve this weapon's damage and performance for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Chrysallis Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a cocoon appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Pyramid Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a pyramid appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Rangefinder
displayProperties.description: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range and zoom magnification. Increased projectile velocity while aiming Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, and Bows.

displayProperties.name: Well of Ordnance
displayProperties.description: Picking up a Solar elemental well grants you additional grenade energy. Multiple copies of this mod increase this effect.

displayProperties.name: Bountiful Wells
displayProperties.description: Elemental well mods that cause you to spawn elemental wells can now stack, spawning additional wells for each additional copy of the mod you have equipped.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Fusion Rifle Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Fusion Rifles get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that Fusion Rifle.

displayProperties.name: Grenade Launcher Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Grenade Launchers get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that Grenade Launcher.

displayProperties.name: Well of Radiance
displayProperties.description: Thrust your Daybreak Sword into the ground. The Sword continuously projects a powerful aura that heals and empowers nearby allies, increasing their weapon damage and protecting them from the effects of Stasis.

displayProperties.name: Sniper Rifle Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Sniper Rifles get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that Sniper Rifle.

displayProperties.name: Force Multiplier
displayProperties.description: Shotgun final blows activate Defensive Strike.

displayProperties.name: Sniper Rifle Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Sniper Rifles over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

displayProperties.name: Grenade Launcher Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Power Grenade Launchers over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

displayProperties.name: Fusion Rifle Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Fusion Rifles over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

displayProperties.name: Light Shift
displayProperties.description: Shift instead of dodge.

displayProperties.name: The Dance
displayProperties.description: Dodge multiple times in rapid succession.

displayProperties.name: Linear Fusion Rifle Targeting
displayProperties.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Linear Fusion Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Winter's Wrath
displayProperties.description:
Summon a [Stasis] Stasis staff. While your Super is active:

[###DestinyNamedSubstitutions.ui_player_action_super_primary_ability_button###] [###DestinyNamedSubstitutions.ui_player_action_super_primary_ability_verb###] : Cast out a barrage of [Stasis] Stasis shards that freeze targets.

[###DestinyNamedSubstitutions.ui_player_action_super_secondary_ability_button###] [###DestinyNamedSubstitutions.ui_player_action_super_secondary_ability_verb###] : Cast out a shockwave that shatters all frozen targets.

displayProperties.name: Wealth
displayProperties.description: Increased Trials Rank points from reaching 3, 5, and 7 match wins on a ticket.

displayProperties.name: Dynamo
displayProperties.description: Reduces Super cooldown when using your class ability near targets.

displayProperties.name: Melee Wellmaker
displayProperties.description: Powered melee final blows spawn elemental wells matching your subclass energy type.

displayProperties.name: Close Enough
displayProperties.description: Extended Chaos Reach.

displayProperties.name: Glacial Quake
displayProperties.description:
Summon a [Stasis] Stasis gauntlet. While your Super is active:

[Heavy Attack]  : Slam your gauntlet down to create a shockwave that freezes targets and sends out [Stasis] Stasis crystals to freeze additional ones.

[Light Attack]  : Supercharge your Shiver Strike for bonus damage. Sprint through [Stasis] Stasis crystals or frozen targets to shatter them instantly.

displayProperties.name: Embers of Light
displayProperties.description: Create combination Healing/Empowering Rifts.

displayProperties.name: Restorative Finisher
displayProperties.description: When you use a finisher, you gain a portion of energy for your least-recharged ability. Requires one-tenth of your Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Fusion Rifle Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases your chances of finding ammo while you have a Fusion Rifle equipped.

displayProperties.name: Ferocity
displayProperties.description: Your third match win grants a bonus win.

displayProperties.name: Sword Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Swords get bonus reserves when picking up Heavy ammo.

displayProperties.name: Illegally Modded Holster
displayProperties.description: Hand Cannons ready faster and gain increased accuracy and bonus damage.

displayProperties.name: Hand Cannon Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Hand Cannons that use Special ammo get bonus reserves when picking up Special ammo.

displayProperties.name: Shotgun Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Shotguns over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

displayProperties.name: Auto Rifle Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Auto Rifles over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

displayProperties.name: Well of Potency
displayProperties.description: Picking up a matching elemental well grants you Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Rocket Launcher Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Rocket Launchers get bonus reserves when picking up Heavy ammo.

displayProperties.name: Sidearm Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Sidearms over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

displayProperties.name: Machine Gun Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Machine Guns over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

displayProperties.name: Auto Rifle Loader
displayProperties.description: Increases reload speed of Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Adagio
displayProperties.description: After defeating a target, this weapon fires, charges, or draws more slowly and deals increased damage for a brief time.

displayProperties.name: Wayfinder's Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a Wayfinder's Compass appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Scatter Charge
displayProperties.description: Enhanced Scatter Grenades.

displayProperties.name: Pulse Rifle Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Pulse Rifles over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

displayProperties.name: Linear Fusion Rifle Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Linear Fusion Rifles over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

displayProperties.name: Well of Restoration
displayProperties.description: Picking up a Stasis elemental well grants you additional energy for your ability that has the lowest energy. Multiple copies of this mod increase this effect.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Time Dilation
displayProperties.description: Elemental well mods that grant you time-limited benefits can now stack, increasing the duration of the effect for each copy of the mod you have equipped.

displayProperties.name: Supreme Wellmaker
displayProperties.description: Casting your Super spawns three Stasis elemental wells near you.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Shards
displayProperties.description: Stasis shards count as Stasis elemental wells for you.

displayProperties.name: Shieldcrash Wellmaker
displayProperties.description: Breaking a shield with the matching weapon type creates a well of the shield's element.

displayProperties.name: Thermoclastic Strike
displayProperties.description:
Solar and Stasis melees disrupt combatants, stunning them, delaying ability regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. Refresh your melee ability whenever you or a member of your fireteam stuns an Overload Champion.

displayProperties.name: Thermoclastic Blooming
displayProperties.description: Defeating a combatant with a Solar or Stasis melee creates an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Headstone
displayProperties.description: Precision final blows spawn a Stasis crystal at the victim's location.

displayProperties.name: Arrow Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Bows that use Heavy ammo get bonus reserves when picking up Heavy ammo.

displayProperties.name: Sniper Rifle Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Sniper Rifles get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that Sniper Rifle.

displayProperties.name: Linear Fusion Rifle Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Linear Fusion Rifles get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that Linear Fusion Rifle.

displayProperties.name: Hands-On
displayProperties.description: Gain bonus Super energy on melee kills.

displayProperties.name: Trace Rifle Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Trace Rifles over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

displayProperties.name: Hand Cannon Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases your chances of finding Special ammo while you have a Hand Cannon that uses Special ammo equipped.

displayProperties.name: Jump Driver
displayProperties.description: Lorentz Driver gains an enhanced radar. Additionally, while this weapon has 3 telemetry patterns, EM Anomaly detonations no longer require a precision final blow.

displayProperties.name: Linear Fusion Rifle Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Linear Fusion Rifles get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that Linear Fusion Rifle.

displayProperties.name: EM Anomaly
displayProperties.description: A precision final blow with this weapon creates an implosion that pulls in nearby targets and damages them with an additional detonation.

displayProperties.name: Dearly Departed
displayProperties.description: Rift grants damage reduction. Grants Rift energy when critically wounded; creates healing rift on death.

displayProperties.name: Hand Cannon Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Hand Cannons that use Special ammo get bonus reserves when picking up Special ammo.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Fire and Ice
displayProperties.description: Defeating a Champion spawns a random array of Solar and Stasis wells.

displayProperties.name: Nova Warp
displayProperties.description:
Step between dimensions to subvert the laws of physics.
[###DestinyNamedSubstitutions.ui_player_action_super_secondary_ability_button###] [###DestinyNamedSubstitutions.ui_player_action_super_secondary_ability_verb###] : Teleport a short distance.
[###DestinyNamedSubstitutions.ui_player_action_super_primary_ability_button###] [###DestinyNamedSubstitutions.ui_player_action_super_primary_ability_verb###] : Unleash a deadly Void eruption.

displayProperties.name: Shotgun Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Shotguns get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that Shotgun.

displayProperties.name: Lightning Weave
displayProperties.description: Melee hits greatly increase weapon reload speed. Dealing damage with a weapon extends the duration.

displayProperties.name: Taken Invigoration
displayProperties.description:
Defeating a challenging Taken combatant refreshes your class ability.

This mod's abilities cannot stack across multiple copies.

displayProperties.name: Bow Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases your chances of finding Heavy ammo while you have a Bow equipped that uses Heavy ammo.

displayProperties.name: Thin the Herd
displayProperties.description: Direct hits do more damage to combatant shields. Damaging multiple combatants increases reload speed. Rapid defeating grenade-damaged combatants refills the magazine.

displayProperties.name: Fusion Rifle Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Fusion Rifles get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that Fusion Rifle.

displayProperties.name: Ascending Amplitude
displayProperties.description: Each target you defeat with Stormtrance increases the damage you deal with it and refunds Super energy when Stormtrance ends.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Fusion Rifles
displayProperties.description: Aiming down Fusion Rifle and Linear Fusion Rifle sights loads a high-impact burst that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Sniper Rifle Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Sniper Rifles get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that Sniper Rifle.

displayProperties.name: Bountiful Unity
displayProperties.description: Earn bonus Trials reputation when winning Trials matches with clanmates.

displayProperties.name: Grenade Launcher Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Grenade Launchers get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that Grenade Launcher.

displayProperties.name: Grenade Launcher Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Grenade Launchers get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that Grenade Launcher.

displayProperties.name: Rocket Launcher Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Rocket Launchers get bonus reserves when picking up Heavy ammo.

displayProperties.name: Melee Kickstart
displayProperties.description: When your melee energy is fully expended, you gain melee energy.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Taken Armaments
displayProperties.description:
Defeating a Taken combatant with a grenade grants Heavy ammo.

This mod's abilities cannot stack across multiple copies.

displayProperties.name: Seeking Wells
displayProperties.description: Elemental wells you create will move across the ground toward nearby players.

displayProperties.name: Well of Striking
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Arc elemental well grants you additional melee energy. Multiple copies of this mod increase this effect.

displayProperties.name: Sword Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Swords get bonus reserves when picking up Heavy ammo.

displayProperties.name: Dynamo
displayProperties.description: Reduces Super cooldown when using your class ability near targets.

displayProperties.name: Electrostatic Surge
displayProperties.description: Your Rift lasts longer. It charges faster and you run faster when allies are near.

displayProperties.name: Withering Heat
displayProperties.description: Causing damage with a Solar ability weakens Champions for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Utility Kickstart
displayProperties.description: When your class ability energy is fully expended, you gain class ability energy.

displayProperties.name: Arrow Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Bows that use Heavy ammo get bonus reserves when picking up Heavy ammo.

displayProperties.name: Shoot to Loot
displayProperties.description: Shooting an ammo brick picks it up and automatically reloads all of your equipped weapons from reserves.

displayProperties.name: Distribution
displayProperties.description: Reduces all ability cooldowns when using your class ability near targets.

displayProperties.name: Enduring Wells
displayProperties.description: Increases the lifespan of elemental wells you create. Multiple copies of this mod stack, further extending the lifespan.

displayProperties.name: Well of Utility
displayProperties.description: Picking up a Void elemental well grants you additional class ability energy. Multiple copies of this mod increase this effect.

displayProperties.name: Igniting Touch
displayProperties.description: Strike a combatant with this melee ability to burn them. Defeating burning combatants causes them to explode.

displayProperties.name: Lagrangian Sight
displayProperties.description: Targeting system

displayProperties.name: Explosive Light
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power increases the next projectile's blast radius and damage.

displayProperties.name: Fusion Rifle Loader
displayProperties.description: Increases reload speed of Fusion Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Bow Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases your chances of finding Heavy ammo while you have a Bow equipped that uses Heavy ammo.

displayProperties.name: Ensemble
displayProperties.description: Improved handling and reload speed when allies are nearby.

displayProperties.name: Calculated Balance
displayProperties.description: While in full auto mode, final blows with this weapon grant bonus damage, accuracy, and stability for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Particle Deconstruction
displayProperties.description: Dealing damage to a combatant with a Fusion Rifle or Linear Fusion Rifle grants bonus damage with a Fusion Rifle or Linear Fusion Rifle against that combatant for a short duration. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
